title: Wolf Girl finds necRomance
description: Note: Alternate-cover edition for ASIN: B014S4AGY8Brennan is a beautiful bi-racial werewolf that lives with her mother and 5 sisters in a super-natural trailer-park. She meets Sani, a handsome Native American Skinwalker at a party, and doesn't realize how dangerous he is before they're already involved. When she meets Lamar, her cousin's boyfriend's cousin, she falls for him immediately and has to decide between the two boys, while helping to maintain her household, work different jobs, and plan for the future. Plot contains profanity, violence, and sexual situations.
author: Gisele R. Walko
